page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: {NORTH LEVERTON with HABBLESTHORPE} is in the Trent valley,between power stations.{COMMUNICATIONS}by road and telephone.{ENERGY}from electricity and coal.{FARMING,}arable.{EMPLOYMENT}at Power Stations,Rampton Hospital, farming and local towns.{HOME-LIFE, housing in modern conditions. {EDUCATION}in modern school. {INFORMATION SERVICES,}post, press. {LANGUAGE}English.{LAW/ORDER}local policeman.{LOCAL HISTORY}back to Vikings. {MEDIA}Local press, radio and television. {POPULATION}approx 1500 {RELIGION}Church of England and Methodist. Tourism is a feature with Windmill and being on the road to the River Trent-water sports in boats. {TRANSPORT}is by road except coal by rail to Power Stations.
